entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 27.
